column1: Baby Barnaby's////I got the Migas this time
column2: and they were really delicious. They load up eggs with fresh peppers and onions
column3: but it's not at all spicy. The salsa has great flavor but little to no kick
column4: so it leaves some to be desired in the heat department. On the table were also a standard breakfast plate and a plate of steak and eggs. Their scrambled eggs are fluffy and fresh tasting
column6: as well. Nana reported the wheat toast was great and not too dark of a wheat
column7: while the English muffins was not ideal. The steak was a little tough
column8: but had really great flavor. The bacon was a good middle of the road thickness
column10: and was received well. Their coffee was awesome
column11: but nothing beats fresh-pressed orange juice.
